Record.Value: Hydroponics and Food
Hydroponics and Cooking
Practical Training: Stage IV
Getting hungry? Test your ability to provide food for yourself.
Welcome Cadet. It's time to test your ability to provide sustenance for yourself far, far from home.
In this phase of testing, we'll look at your ability to grow food, then cook it up into something useful. The first step is to create a water network. Start by building a water tank connector.
Build the tank connecter in the highlighted postion
Put the water tank on the tank connecter.
Use wrench to connect water tank to tank connector.
Tank connectors let you attach tanks to pipe networks - a liquid network, in this case. Finish the liquid pipe network by connecting the pipes to the hydroponic tray array.
Get liquid pipes from crate
Place pipe
Place the last pipe and Finish pipe system
Before you plant anything, set up a grow light, so you can grow all through the night, too, bruh.
Get grow light kit from crate
Place grow light in highlighted position
Turn on growlight

You can grow a variety of plants using a range of hydroponic systems and atmospheric combinations. But today, we're just testing the basics: you've got water and light, so it's time to plant wheat in each of the hydroponic trays.
Get wheat from crate
Plant wheat in the hydroponics trays.

Plants require specific proportions of gases to grow. We'll be testing your skills with gas systems in the next phase, but for now, just wait for the wheat to grow. We've added a little super fertilizer to speed things up.
Wait for wheat to grow.
It's harvest time! You can eat raw wheat - if you like - but it will provide more nourishment if you process and cook it. Use the reagent processor to turn the wheat into flour.
Harvest Wheat
Add wheat to reagent processor funnel
Turn on bench
Turn on reagent processor
Now you have flour, let's get baking. You can cook a variety of foods in the microwave - including muffins. Sound delicious?
Add egg to microwave
Add 10ml milk to microwave
Add 50g flour to microwave
Turn On the microwave
Bake muffin
You're about to recieve one of Agrizero's finest muffins. Enjoy it, and banish that hunger, Cadet.
Eat the muffin

Well done, Cadet. You've demonstrated a high degree of self-sufficiency, and a acceptable culinary talent. The Stationeer Command will be proud of you. Press the important blue button to transmit your results.
Press important button
Create Flour
